title: Mike Pines disagrees with the word "deputy" on religious grounds. He doesn't want to be called vice presidential candidate.
subtitle: Report that the Republican candidate Mike Pines doesn't want to be referred to as Vice President because he's opposed to using the word "organ" on religious grounds.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The Republican Party candidate Mike Pines does not want to be referred to as Vice President because he opposes the use of the word "organ" for religious reasons.
